description: Try our easy to follow Tuna & Cannellini Lettuce Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tuna salad,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Fish,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tuna & Cannellini Lettuce Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g can tuna in brine, drained, flaked
0.5 small red capsicum, deseeded, finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine beans, tuna, celery, onion, capsicum and parsley in a large bowl. Whisk oil and lemon juice together and pour over tuna mixture. Season well and toss through with a fork. Transfer to a serving bowl.
Separate lettuce leaves, rinse and shake well to remove excess water. Top with the tuna filling and serve.
